schema.name: Healthyfied boiled eggplant ensalada

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the eggplant, onion, and capsicum under cold water.
Bring a pot of water to boil. Meanwhile, cut the eggplant into halves.
Boil the eggplant halves for 8-10 minutes until tender.
While the eggplant is boiling, thinly slice the white onion and capsicum.
Once the eggplant is cooked and cooled, gently peel and cut it into strips.
In a bowl, combine the eggplant strips with the sliced onion and capsicum. Season with 0.25 teaspoon of salt, and mix well.

schema.description: Dive into a healthy feast with our Healthyfied Boiled Eggplant Ensalada. Perfect for those adhering to a low-carb and low-sugar diet, this recipe brings a refreshing twist to your healthy food repertoire. Focused on nutritious ingredients and bold flavors, it's a delight for anyone looking to maintain a balanced lifestyle while indulging in delicious, healthified recipes.
